1. Ataxia-telangiectasia (AT) is a disease.
2. Mutations of the ATM gene are related to Ataxia-telangiectasia.
3. Japanese Ataxia-telangiectasia patients have detected mutations in their ATM gene.
4. The specific mutations identified are 4612del165 and 7883del5.

So, the disease entities in the paragraph are Ataxia-telangiectasia and the genetic mutations 4612del165 and 7883del5.

1. Ataxia-telangiectasia
2. Mutations (specifically, ATM gene mutations) related to Ataxia-telangiectasia
